I use to fly from Auckland to the Sevens every year. I was grateful to perform there over the weekend, but it was so sad to see it like that

The man! https://t.co/v1NwBviyaB
Kenya is actually the team I go for in Sevens. I love that they dance when they score tries. That's fun.

America. Wow! Land of the free...Just not if you're brown or black. #Trump #USA
@netanyahu #FreePalestine
The news is reporting news from other news networks. It's challenging to trust presenters, when they read a script not get the story.
Too much! https://t.co/t0SwxKG8sP
@martynpepperell @leilaadu @CityGalleryWgtn will she be here on Saturday?...could have her play at Te Whare Waka.
I just had the pleasure of interviewing @EtanaStrongOne for Sweet Sounz. What a lovely soul. Safe travels to Aotearoa sister.
Waiora had his first day at Kōhanga Reo today. Massive moment for our little Whānau! https://t.co/DDmuewy9wk
This week! @SweetSounz Listen now - https://t.co/WBTYuFWezo #Aotearoa #NewZealand https://t.co/XinnOgx7PI

@Kaitiakituturu @Mihi_Forbes @TheHuiTV3 @guardian this is a good point. How real are we about it. It seems not that much.
Sweet Sounz - Vol 3 is up! (link in bio) We kōrero with award winning film maker Chris Graham… https://t.co/01yfLTQCm9
That's what happens when you worship capitalism. You'll eventually be led by a capitalist. Money before people. The rich white boy club #USA
The bro's father in law is the head Wine maker for Te Mata. He's a top bloke. We're canning the wines. $250 bottles too haha!
@rents1 @Rarerecordings_ tomorrow?...
There was a Te Reo Māori option on the ATM so I used it. Loved it! #Moni #Pūtea #Aotearoa #NewZealand https://t.co/FBE1C01fCu
Bob Jones doesn't have the courage to say what he did to Māori because he knows all his money won't stop his teeth being knocked out.
@puawai_ I still collect, but just No.1 issues and sets. That's us cuz!
I liked a @YouTube video from @changeyoutubetg https://t.co/FYxGpNNKBU GRAHAM HANCOCK ITS ALL LIES Forbidden History
@puawai_ that's Kiwi Blacks half brother! Kiwi's mum is from Ruatoki haha! Too much.
@puawai_ you know there's a Marvel character called Kiwi Black too. @Marvel
I liked a @YouTube video https://t.co/impaGLVZfE The Great Pacific Navigators
@rdu985fm we'd love to get our Sweet Sounz Radio Show on RDU.
@DenyceLawton @Nesian_Mystik also check out our tune "Sun goes down"
@DenyceLawton @Nesian_Mystik thanks so much!...
@FlyAirNZ you're my favourite airline, but your staff must pronounce Māori names correctly. Tauranga not T-Ow-Rang-Gah. Fix it.
Early flight to Tauranga Moana this morning. Big day of Hui. Homai te mauri!
@shanemarr3 shoot me an email teawanui@soulnote.co.nz
What an honour it was to watch my cousin in his oral examination for his PhD in Te Reo Māori. So proud of him.
I really enjoyed this! https://t.co/XmCGPLrPFp
Catch us right now! Listen now - https://t.co/WBTYuFWezo #SweetSounz #Aotearoa #NewZealand https://t.co/vxr4Bcsifq
My daughter came to my touch rugby game tonight. I loved seeing her there cheering us on. #whānau
Every Sunday 2pm - 4pm! Across Iwi radio, 88 FM (Cook Islands) and Magic FM (Samoa) with more stations joining us n… https://t.co/CuNMf9e7Aq
@huihoppa @TheSpinoffTV loved the - positive doesn't negate negative, both can be true.
My son starts Kōhanga reo this month. As a second language learner of my own language, this is a major moment for our Whānau.
Walking into Bunnings makes you feel like you can build anything haha.
Listen to some tunes while you tweet - https://t.co/WBTYuFWezo
I just got some lovely drums kits for Logic from David Atai. Looking forward to getting back to the writing and producing this month.
@JGMKHuch @SweetSounz yeah man, later in the year though. Good looking out!
@JGMKHuch @SweetSounz is that Android?...if so, yup!...
Also, download our free @SweetSounz app - https://t.co/ME1zgUm5tU listen to us right now 😘#Aotearoa #NewZealand
Proud moment. Vol 1 of Sweet Sounz is being syndicated with stations around the world right now. Listen now -… https://t.co/9731Q1Nv9v
Syndicating the @SweetSounz radio show this week! Catch it on your local Iwi station and https://t.co/WBTYuFWezo every Sunday 2pm-4pm ✌🏾
Hey Whānau. While you're tweeting, pump the jams! Grab the Sweet Sounz App - https://t.co/ME1zgUDGls or stream via https://t.co/WBTYuFWezo
Wow. Just came across @Innamodja loving Tombouctou! #WOMAD
@Chandy229 @TheRacesNZ see if they need entertainment 😊
@puawai_ @Tenani counter colonise is the long term plan...sssh don't let them know cuz 😉
A night away without the kids. A whole nights sleep without waking up to change my sons nappy or putting my daughter back to sleep. Amazing!
Ka pai! I wonder how Judith says her address? It's disappointing she feels this way. #Waipukurau https://t.co/BxLgj99BR7
Ok, uncles off to bed now. Pō Marie Whānau. Don't try and be a hero, just finish your inu and go back home for a kai and moe.
While our friends were counting down. I was in the next room putting my son to sleep. Seeing him safe and peaceful made me so fulfilled.
Hey Whānau. If you get a moment, check out https://t.co/WBTYuFWezo 🖖🏾
Having a whiskey. Why? Because I can and our 1st Sweet Sounz Show for Iwi and mainstream is being bounced as I type. https://t.co/yjGnn0Fdbl
Voicing EP 1 of our syndicated Sweet Sounz show today that will go out to Iwi Radio.
@Eliota_Sapolu I fell asleep too haha!
@NateNauer @Akhdre_ the texture! Wow. And I'm meaning the voice haha.
@puawai_ can you send email to me again haha. My mac crashed so I lost all my concerts.
It's awesome that they've used a mix of the Polynesian languages. It's buzzing me out hearing Māori. #Moana
Watching Moana. Uncle Tem's voice cracks me up. He's like Denzel. Forever "The Man"! Haha.
@KateMontgom @martynpepperell haha! Thanks for sharing. It's always a healthy challenge signing a booty with class.
@martynpepperell that's the plan for life haha!
@martynpepperell haha! You're great at what you do brother. Wishing you a wonderful Christmas!...
Two games of touch rugby this week. Each time ending with good chats and a few beers. Thankful to leave 50m from the park haha.
Reading Doreal's translation and interpretation of the Emerald Tablets. It resonates.
Wow. This is a proud moment. Thank you to our listeners. Exceeding bandwidth means lots of people are listening 😄… https://t.co/CJapnPtBEU
@Anto1nett3 have a wonderful Christmas.
@Anto1nett3 great taste in music!
First time I've used an architect and sought council consent. It's not cheap haha! But I'm enjoying the process.
@LawlessMel haha! Yeah, just learning some covers.
Talking music with Pet Johnson is always inspiring. Thankful to create and share the vibes.
Having a sing this morning, rehearsing, and realised that "Knocks me off my feet" is beautifully written.
@Rarerecordings_ @NateNauer yeah man, some promoter from Auckland...sad man. Cowboys, dime a dozen in the industry.
Have a great day fam! Also, if you get a chance download my Sweet Sounz App - https://t.co/ME1zgUDGls It's free!...
@NateNauer yeah man...that's why they're trying make some back for her. A promoter in Aussie picked up a gig that will get her home.
@NateNauer yeah man, heard the promoted took off with all her money. Poor girl.
@puawai_ @tamawaipara me too!
First time I've been in the Tauranga Airport Koru Lounge. Cute!
@puawai_ we can do it cuz! But I go between Welly and home.
I liked a @YouTube video from @shipibospirit https://t.co/fNjyJf2Bdn Exploring More Mysterious Ancient Megaliths Near Cusco Peru
Here's some of our listeners streaming right now. Crazy to think people stream us from around the world everyday, a… https://t.co/PyhvqFuxpp
I had great conversation with my Uber driver Tim. Lately, I've been more aware to take time to sincerely connect with people. It's awesome.
Hey beautiful tweeple. I've have the best online music station in New Zealand and you should know about it - https://t.co/WBTYuFWezo
Opened my brand new PA tonight. The mixer is digital and the speakers connect via Bluetooth. So cool! If you need to hire a PA let me know!
Social media is a whole lot of noise. But within it, there are some beautiful frequencies. You gotta chuck on the EQ.
Loved rehearsing tonight. Keep the vocal sharp. Jamming tunes at Bridge Pā Wine Festival next month.
@NateNauer Haha! Good man, call them out!
@NateNauer @martynpepperell I told my mate that runs The Grand to be weary about that gig.
@NateNauer haha what happened?
@Rarerecordings_ Haha! Leave us alone. We're rebuilding.
Popped into kōhanga today and was almost in tears listening to the tamariki sing. He tino ātaahua tērā.
Wow. A lot of unconvinced people in The Greenman. #Wellington
All I see when Kevin Barry's face is on TV is the guy that ripped off David Tua. David deserved more. He would waste both these guys.
This is awesome - https://t.co/whv71vnweZ
